author: Diana Olick
title: Virtual and solo home touring soars as social distancing hits the housing market amid coronavirus fear
description: Much like all interaction in the age of COVID-19, home touring is moving online and going solo.
content:
While homebuyer demand has plummeted, there are still some out there who may need to move, and either purchase or rent a home. So, much like all interaction in the age of COVID-19, home touring is moving online and going solo.
